text:
Maurice Richard "Maury" Povich (born January 17, 1939) is an American television talk show host. He hosts the tabloid talk show "Maury".
Education and career.
Povich graduated from the Landon School in 1957. He graduated from the University of Pennsylvania in 1962 with a degree in television journalism. He hosted the 2000 revival of the television game show "Twenty One".
Personal life.
Povich is married to former news anchor Connie Chung.
